data.title: Don't Touch the White Women! (Original photograph from the 1974 film) by Marco Ferreri (director, screenwriter); Bernard Prim (photographer); Rafael Azcona (screenwriter); Catherine Deneuve, Marcello
data.meta_description: Soft cover - Films sans Frontieres, Paris - 1974 - Vintage borderless press photograph showing director Marco Ferreri on the set of the 1974 French-Italian film, with camera and crew behind him. With stamps of photographer Bernard Prim and French magazine "Paru dans le point," as well as manuscript annotations, on the verso. A farcical reenactment of the events leading up to, and including, The Battle of Little Big Horn, anachronistically set in a contemporary area of Paris slated for urban renewal. 9.25 x 6.25 inches. Near Fine. Cox, 10,000 Ways to Die. - Don't Touch the White Women! (Original photograph from the 1974 film)
